title: AS ORIKHIV DIRECTION RUSIAN Army Shelled Poltavka, Malynivka, Magic, Belogiria, Novodanylivka, Five Dyhatka of Zaporizhzhia ...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Poltavka, Malynivka, Charivne, Bilohirya, Novodanylivka, Pyatykhatky of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
